page.title: 21Unemployment 2011
page.content:
Inthis area unemployment has not changed, indeed there are no industries where once there was

Mining,Shipbuilding.Steelworks.Clothing factories,Engineering.

The demise of the mining industry was followed by the collapse of many of the above and this impacted on the local communities .Young men and women have no work at eighteen, or few apprentiships. Today the scene is much the same every job is over subscribed. Anyone who can make University must now pay a large fee Â£9000 when they graduate in employment.
Contribution by: Anonymous
